attributes.TECHNICAL_DESCR:
The project consists of the development of a Salt Cavern for H2 seasonal storage in the Cantabria as part of the national Spanish hydrogen system.
The key infrastructure components H2 storage North-1 will have the following technical specifications:
- Injection capacity: 11 mcm/d - 41 GWh/d.
- Withdrawal capacity: 11 mcm/d - 41 GWh/d.
- Working gas volume of 6,884 t is expected by 2030. In later development stages the working gas volume will reach up to 13,767 t.
The underground hydrogen storage capacity is expected to increase from 77 mcm to 154 mcm under normal conditions.
attributes.IMPLEMENTATION_STATUS_DESCR: Planned but not yet in permitting
